Text:
Very nice driver packs tested on emachines D729Z. The built-in wifi is not working on Windows XP SP3. I used this driver pack to enable the wifi...works great! emachines D729Z comes only with drivers for vista/windows 7 but not for windows xp.

This driver pack is multi-language. You can select drivers that you want to update. Most apps are built-in but mostly russian but you can uncheck them to disable installation.

Very useful during offline driver installation. Tested also on ASUS P5GC-MX/1333 motherboard. Works great.

English is the default menu but you can choose other languages.

thanks to emopirate...great torrent.
